name: Marblelirium
description:
Marblelirium (Marble- lirium as in delirium) is a game made in the spirit of the old classic, Marble Madness.  Roll your way through 5 unique challenging levels in this free version before time runs out. 

MAC version seems to work now! Enjoy!

ANDROID version NOW AVAILABLE!  Also sports 9 levels in the mobile version.

Controls:

W,S,A,D or arrow keys          - move marble.

Escape                                   - Pause menu.
